title: Maximizing Benefits with the Amex Platinum Card The Points Guy

type_specific.selection: A new year means a new opportunity to use several credit card benefits, and with premium cards like the Platinum Card from American Express, there are plenty of great perks to leverage. TPG Points & Miles Editor Sarah Silbert goes through the list of top Amex Platinum perks that you can enjoy throughout 2016. The...
